welcome.subtitle: Please wait while we load the app...

about.tribe_text_1: The idea of VELLA was born in 2024, inspired by a shared frustration â€” walking into barbershops and never quite feeling seen, heard, or styled right.
about.tribe_text_2: Our community is made of rebels, creatives, and newcomers â€” people tired of average, seeking to leave a mark with every step, every fade, every look.
about.mission_text_1: VELLA exists to empower identity through fresh cuts and fearless self-expression.
about.mission_text_2: Every session is a collaboration. Every mirror a reminder: you are art in motion.
